name: Arc-en-ciel Réfraction
text: If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Dream Prism" from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can discard 1 Warrior monster; add 1 "Arc-en-ciel" Warrior monster with a different Attribute from your Deck to your hand. While you control no monster with the same Attribute, monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap effects. You can only activate "Arc-en-ciel Réfraction'' once per turn.
